articles.title: Airtel 5G to Get Bolstered With Capital Investments - TelecomTalk
articles.description: Airtel will invest more in 5G by shifting investments from 4G. Airtel will also not shutdown 2G right away due to the considerable subscriber base using 2G devices in India.
